dcterms:description: This dataset serves as a guide to various phylogenetic metrics that are applicable in conservation, community ecology, and macroecology.
dcterms:title: Phylogenetic metrics for conservation

dcterms:description: This dataset reviews the application of digital evolution in ecological research, highlighting its potential and methodologies.
dcterms:title: Digital evolution for ecology research

dcterms:description: This dataset provides genome annotations that enable phylogenetic inference over distributed populations, focusing on hereditary stratigraphy.
dcterms:title: Hereditary stratigraphy: Genome annotations

dcterms:description: This dataset describes the hstrat Python package, which is designed for phylogenetic inference on distributed digital evolution populations.

dcterms:description: This dataset explores how host phylogeny shapes viral transmission networks in an island ecosystem, providing insights into pathogen dynamics.
